### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (62.0, -54.0) with 27 coal as fuel.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (107.5, -33.5) and pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) and pipes at positions (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5), pipes at positions (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), (117.5, -27.5), (118.5, -27.5), and (119.5, -27.5), and a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5).

### Belts
Consists of two belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5) with direction UP.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to identify any issues that may be preventing the insertion.

### Errors when using entities
- Ensure that entities are properly connected and have the necessary resources to function.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to identify any issues that may be preventing it from working.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
